result.title: Internship
result.description:
公司扩大团队继续招募： 
 
We have multi positions open: Good at both Chinese and English are required.  
Working Remote in anywhere in the State, Welcome student internship (OTP & CPT)

Project 1) Online Education Software Develop
Project 2) Create Platform of Marathon and Endurance sports information service 

1）Web Developer, Computer Science Engineer.
2）E-commerce & Digital Marketing Specialist
3）Business Developer
We are developing a platform, which can provide many people with opportunities in learning, working, entrepreneurship, socialize etc. 
Company website: www.runchinamarathon.com, 
www.greatwall-run.com   
www.greatwall-mutianyu.com 
Contact: Email: charles@runchinamarathon.com.  WeChat：chuckqh
